articles.title: Type 2 diabetes: Sprinkle this tasty treat on your food to improve insulin and blood sugar - Express
articles.description: TYPE 2 diabetes is the result of poor insulin production and unstable blood sugar levels. Research suggests a tasty flavouring can address both.
articles.content: Type 2 diabetes reveals one of two important characteristics about a person's body: that their pancreas does not produce enough insulin or the cells are resistant to the insulin it does produce. Both… [+2336 chars]
